Class.remarks:
Use the following resource identifiers for dispatching strings to the boc list.
Property Resource Identifier
PageInfo
<BocList Resource ID>:PageInfo
e.g. auto:MyBocList:PageInfo
FixedColumns[x].ColumnTitle
<BocList Resource ID>:FixedColumns:<Column ID>:ColumnTitle
e.g. auto:MyBocList:FixedColumns:FirstColumn:ColumnTitle
Applies to all columns.
FixedColumns[x].Text
<BocList Resource ID>:FixedColumns:<Column ID>:Text
e.g. auto:MyBocList:FixedColumns:FirstColumn:Text
Applies to columns of type .
OptionsMenuItems[x].Text
<BocList Resource ID>:OptionsMenuItems:<Menu Item ID>:Text
e.g. auto:MyBocList:OptionsMenuItems:FirstItem:Text
ListMenuItems[x].Text
<BocList Resource ID>:ListMenuItems:<Menu Item ID>:Text
e.g. auto:MyBocList:ListMenuItems:FirstItem:Text
